title: RHOBH: Every Rosé Has Its Thorn
description:
If you have a rosé tasting and half your castmates aren't there to see it, did you ever really have a rosé tasting? That's one of the many existential questions lurking within the latest Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which features Rinna airing some unfinished business with Sutton.

Don't just listen to the episode, watch it too with Crappens on Demand here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/70072408?pr=true
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
